We were experimenting with some pretty crazy things back then, not saying it happened or didn't but my Grandfather worked on a Naval destroyer during WWII and he said early one morning another ship passed by approx 1 mile away and as it passed through the fog the entire exterior of the ship glowed a pale green color, they had never seen anything like it before and within minutes of seeing the glowing ship they were all ordered by the President (of the USA of course) to remain silent, who knows what our military/government has and is working on, the technology that's available to the public today is capable of amazing things, just imagine what the military/government isn't telling us about, think about it. 

Regarding the movie, well its just not my cup of tea, crappy plot line, bad actors, old special effects, I got about 15min in and I just couldn't take any more.
